articles.title: Microsoft Stock (NASDAQ:MSFT) Falters on Hibernation Fix Flop, Unexpected Xbox Permaban - TipRanks
articles.description: Tech giant Microsoft ($MSFT) has not been having a great Monday so far. Reports of a hibernation bug previously thought fixed have emerged to say that the fix did not
articles.content: Story HighlightsMicrosoft can’t quite fix a hibernation bug, and boots a deceased predator from its Xbox roster.

articles.author: Shalu Saraf
articles.title: SoFi Stock Slides after Earnings, but Mizuho Says ‘Buy on Weakness’ - TipRanks
articles.description: SoFi Technologies Inc. ($SOFI) shares are trading lower despite a strong quarterly report and upbeat guidance. The pullback appears driven by renewed worries over the loss of Chime as a
articles.content: Story HighlightsSoFi shares slipped after earnings, but Mizuho analyst Dan Dolev calls the pullback a buying opportunity. Let’s understand why.
